WELCOME TO BEST RESORT IN LONAVALA -

Green Velvet Resort,Pawna.

If you want to spend a memorable vacation in a beautiful location, Lonavala is the place to go, and Green Velvet Resort is the ideal choice and best resort in Lonavala! The Green Velvet Resort, one of the luxury resorts in Lonavala, is located between the cities of Mumbai and Pune and is hosted and mothered by the Sahyadri hills. It is only two hours from Mumbai and one hour from Pune.

Green Velvet Resort, known for its lavishness and sheer beauty, has solidified itself as one of the top resorts in Lonavala. This 3-star resort in Lonavala holds the title of being the best resort in Lonavala and the vicinity of Mumbai and Pune. This luxury resort in Lonavala, conveniently located in the heart of the city, provides the most popular weekend destination for Mumbai and Pune at the best prices. Green Velvet Resort is one of the best resorts in Lonavala, and it has created the ideal setting for holidays, business, events, weddings, pool parties, pre-wedding shoots, and much more, all while providing you with a once-in-a-lifetime experience.
